#Questions - practise the functions learnt during the class
Q1 If I roll a six-sided dice once, what is the probability of getting a number less than 5?

```{r}
source("prob.R")

s_one_dice <-rolldie(1)

s_sum_less_than_5 <- s_one_dice %>%
  filter(total < 5)

s_sum_less_than_5
```
